title: Solution to League randomly minimizing itself?
body:
Tried numerous things.  Nothing is working and its seriously affecting gameplay.

Leveling 2nd account to play around with in normals and ranked.  

Basicly league will randomly for no apparent reason minimize itself.  Doesnt exit me from game just minimizes and i can go back into only problem is its affecting how i play.  With almost hitting 30 soon id like the problem to be fixed before i play ranked.  Is there a way to give league complete priority to were it wont close itself anymore?

replies.body: I see Targons Blade was helping out in another thread.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can dig deeper into this with you individually.  We'll get back to you!
